languages.text: "Славный вышел пир в честь победы над слугами Архиврага! Эттфатер, за гостеприимство я обещаю однажды оказать тебе честь и пригласить на торжество на Фенрисе!"
"A glorious feast in honour of your victory over the Archenemy's servants! Aett-Vater, for your hospitality, I promise one day to honour you and invite you to a celebration on Fenris!"
languages.original_text: "Славный вышел пир в честь победы над слугами Архиврага! Эттфатер, за гостеприимство я обещаю однажды оказать тебе честь и пригласить на торжество на Фенрисе!"

traits.locale_text: "A glorious feast in honour of your victory over the Archenemy's servants! Aett-Vater, for your hospitality, I promise one day to honour you and invite you to a celebration on Fenris!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A glorious feast in honour of your victory over the Archenemy's servants! Aett-Vater, for your hospitality, I promise one day to honour you and invite you to a celebration on Fenris!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “真是场盛大的筵席啊，庆祝我们战胜了混沌大敌的仆人！感谢你的盛情款待，狼领！我保证有一天，也会荣幸邀请你参加芬里斯的庆祝活动！”
languages.original_text: "A glorious feast in honour of your victory over the Archenemy's servants! Aett-Vater, for your hospitality, I promise one day to honour you and invite you to a celebration on Fenris!"

traits.locale_text: “真是场盛大的筵席啊，庆祝我们战胜了混沌大敌的仆人！感谢你的盛情款待，狼领！我保证有一天，也会荣幸邀请你参加芬里斯的庆祝活动！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Un festin glorieux pour célébrer notre victoire sur les serviteurs du Grand Ennemi ! Aett-vater, pour vous remercier de votre hospitalité, j'organiserai un jour une grande fête sur Fenris en votre honneur ! »
languages.original_text: "A glorious feast in honour of your victory over the Archenemy's servants! Aett-Vater, for your hospitality, I promise one day to honour you and invite you to a celebration on Fenris!"

traits.locale_text: « Un festin glorieux pour célébrer notre victoire sur les serviteurs du Grand Ennemi ! Aett-vater, pour vous remercier de votre hospitalité, j'organiserai un jour une grande fête sur Fenris en votre honneur ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «¡Un glorioso festín en honor de la victoria contra los sirvientes del Archienemigo! Aett-Vater, por su hospitalidad, ¡prometo honrarle con una invitación a un festín en Fenris!».
languages.original_text: "A glorious feast in honour of your victory over the Archenemy's servants! Aett-Vater, for your hospitality, I promise one day to honour you and invite you to a celebration on Fenris!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Un glorioso festín en honor de la victoria contra los sirvientes del Archienemigo! Aett-Vater, por su hospitalidad, ¡prometo honrarle con una invitación a un festín en Fenris!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「渾沌の勢力の従者に勝利したお前を称える栄光の宴だ！アエット＝ヴァテルよ、温かいもてなしの礼に、いつかお前を称えてフェンリスの式典に招待すると約束しよう！」
languages.original_text: "A glorious feast in honour of your victory over the Archenemy's servants! Aett-Vater, for your hospitality, I promise one day to honour you and invite you to a celebration on Fenris!"

traits.locale_text: 「渾沌の勢力の従者に勝利したお前を称える栄光の宴だ！アエット＝ヴァテルよ、温かいもてなしの礼に、いつかお前を称えてフェンリスの式典に招待すると約束しよう！」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ein glorreiches Festmahl zu Ehren Eures Siegs über die Diener des Erzfeinds! Aett-Vater, für Eure Gastfreundschaft verspreche ich, Euch eines Tages zu ehren und zu einer Feier auf Fenris einzuladen!"
languages.original_text: "A glorious feast in honour of your victory over the Archenemy's servants! Aett-Vater, for your hospitality, I promise one day to honour you and invite you to a celebration on Fenris!"

traits.locale_text: "Ein glorreiches Festmahl zu Ehren Eures Siegs über die Diener des Erzfeinds! Aett-Vater, für Eure Gastfreundschaft verspreche ich, Euch eines Tages zu ehren und zu einer Feier auf Fenris einzuladen!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "A glorious feast in honour of your victory over the Archenemy's servants! Aett-Vater, for your hospitality, I promise one day to honour you and invite you to a celebration on Fenris!"

languages.text: "Şerbaşı'nın hizmetkârlarına karşı kazandığın zafere yaraşır şanlılıkta bir ziyafet! Aett-Vater, misafirperverliğine karşılık seni bir gün Fenris'teki bir kutlamaya çağırarak onurlandırmak isterim!"
languages.original_text: "A glorious feast in honour of your victory over the Archenemy's servants! Aett-Vater, for your hospitality, I promise one day to honour you and invite you to a celebration on Fenris!"

traits.locale_text: "Şerbaşı'nın hizmetkârlarına karşı kazandığın zafer adına şanlı bir ziyafet! Aett-Vater, misafirperverliğin için seni bir gün Fenris'teki bir kutlamaya çağırarak onurlandırmak isterim!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
